title: DSW Style Upholstered Dining Chair Deep Purple
body: An Iconic chair from 1948, this Mobelaris style DSW chair is a contemporary version of the legendary Fibreglass Chair. A combination of Fibreglass shell seat top and wooden legs and metal cross struts. The comfortable fully upholstered seat in Hopsack Fabric is available in many vibrant colors. A piece of distinctive furniture that will surely leave a mark to your home.
